Package IMDB

Classes
imdbAccessing IMDB information
imdb_budgetAccessing IMDB Budget Data
imdb_movielistAccessing miscellaneous IMDB movie lists
imdb_nowplayingObtain the Now Playing Movies in theaters of USA, from IMDB
imdb_personAccessing IMDB staff information
imdb_topchartsObtaining the information about Moviemeter Top 10 and Weekend box office of IMDB
imdb_trailersObtaining the URL of the trailer Flash Movie
imdbpsearchSearching IMDB staff information
imdbsearchSearch the IMDB for a title and obtain the movies IMDB ID
imdbXMLXML Generation
